title: Duped skin shards?
body:
I've tried asking this in a Riot support ticket but it was never solved for whatever reason, so I'l ask it here.

A while ago I had received Viridian Kayle out of a Project capsule and wanted to unlock it permanently. When I had tried to do so however, the client crashed. As I relogged in, I saw that I now had a Viridian Kayle permanent in my inventory instead, but I also had the skin unlocked. I assume that this occured because of a glitch. I'm asking because I want to use it in a reroll but I'm not sure if it should even be there or not. Am I allowed to use it or not?

replies.body: Hey, it looks like a specialist reached out yesterday in your ticket.  Just to confirm, you're fine to use them!
Oh, okay, thanks! For some reason whenever I visit the ticket page it's completely blank, but thanks for letting me know.
